text: Xavier Tondo Volpini (5 November 1978 – 23 May 2011) was a Spanish professional bicycle racer. He mainly participated in bicycle races up the mountain. On 23 May 2011, while he was getting his bicycle ready for a ride, Tondo was trapped between his own garage door and car. He was crushed by the door. One of his teammates, Beñat Intxausti, was with him during the accident. == References == == Other websites == *Profile at Cycling Archives Category:1978 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Accidental deaths in Spain Category:Spanish cyclists
title: Xavier Tondo
